text: //and now you're actually ignoring me and I don't know why. Did I do something wrong? You won't talk to me. I can take a hint though, I'm just confused because being friends was something you still wanted. So what happened? Anyway, I'll go. I won't bother you anymore. Adios.

text: //I understand you don't want to ship anymore. But you said you still wanted to be friends with me. Yet we never talk and every time I do, your excuse is that I get mad at you when you know that's not true. I was more than happy to be your friend, we used to talk all the time +

text: //Might end up picking a few fcs for Charlie since I am VERY indecisive and can't just pick one. Ugh.. I know Baekhyun for sure I wanna keep and Junhee too. Gotta look at the list again and pick one or two out. Hmm.. maybe it doesn't HAVE to be a korean fc? I dunno. I'm rambling.

text: I'm not g-gonna push... if you w-wanna talk, you know I'm here. But no, I w-won't chase after you. I w-won't chase after a-anyone.

text: //I'll miss hearing you outside my door at night. I'll miss everything about you, Potato. I just hope you make some good friends up there in cat heaven. I will never forget you potato, I love you. 💔

author: ✧Charlie✧MD/Trash Partner/Unlovable/Unworthy
text: //until you walked away after getting tired of it. I don't know who I'll give your kitty treats to, but every time I look at dairy flavored treats, I'll think of you. I'll miss seeing you napping in your box in the kitchen, or on the treadmill. I'll miss seeing you in my room. +

text: //always watching me when I worked on homework. Thank you for always wanting to sleep on my bed with me, and for waking me up in the middle of the night so I would let you in so you could sleep under my bed. I'll always remember us eating together, and me brushing your hair +
